website_summaries.verdict: A beautiful walnut easel perfect for those who need versatility and portability but want an attractive finish.
pros: Adjustable to be used as either a tabletop or standing easel, making it perfect for those who travel or like to paint outside
Spacious drawer is convenient for storing supplies
cons: Some users found it to be too heavy to carry on longer hikes, at around 13 lb

customer_reviews.title: Keeps collapsing - do not recommend
customer_reviews.text: Looks beautiful but I am very disappointed at the quality. With in 4 days, the legs collapsed. This is not user error. I am an architectural designer and work on real construction jobsites...I know what needs to be done to put it together and how to screw it together correctly. Put it back up and hoped it wouldn't happen again - 2 weeks later - same thing. It is not sturdy enough to draw on as it just falls apart. Wishing it wasn't true...but it is.
customer_reviews.author: LM

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful!
customer_reviews.text: Great quality but I will say assembling took me a bit to figure out. If you have an extra set of hands it can probably be easier but by yourself be careful, there is a lot of things that need to be tightened and adjusted!
customer_reviews.author: Danielle

customer_reviews.title: Happy with my purchase
customer_reviews.text: This is my first easel. I use it indoors because I don't have a dedicated painting area- easy to put everything away. I have no complaints other than I wish the storage area was a bit taller.
customer_reviews.author: Fraxinus

customer_reviews.title: Very nice!
customer_reviews.text: This easel is sturdy and beautiful. It's pretty easy to assemble (I did ask my handsome honey to help a little bit because he's better at those things). The leg height adjusts perfectly so that I can either sit down and use it or stand up. I love the little drawer. It holds what I need and makes it easy to keep stuff together. I strongly recommend this easel.
customer_reviews.author: Larry F.

customer_reviews.title: Christmas Shoppers Beware
customer_reviews.text: They put the product sticker of the name and images on the outside of the box. Come on down porch pirates and clam your prize. If the person you buy this for lives in the same house, good luck trying to surprise them if they're the one who beats you to the door and accidentally take a look at the box.
customer_reviews.author: Matt

customer_reviews.title: sturdy and good value
customer_reviews.text: I'm really impressed with this easel. It's very sturdy. It did take me some time, and some help from my dad, to figure out how to unfold everything. I did think that there would be a flat piece so that my canvas would lay against a hard surface, but I think that was just wishful thinking on my part. I really like this easel and I'm enjoying using it. It doesn't take up a lot of space, so I can leave it up all the time.
customer_reviews.author: Maryelizabeth Ward

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: The easel collapsed TWICE with my painting on it even though the canvas were only 16x20!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful and very affordable
customer_reviews.text: This easel (I actually bought two of them) is pretty enough to be furniture. It is relatively light, and easy to assemble. For the money it's fantastic. It's also sturdy, and has enough storage for a big assortment of brushes and paints. Even comes with a large palette.
customer_reviews.author: surfshred

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful and good quality!
customer_reviews.text: Super elegant and beautiful to look at, but also very functional for painting or displaying. Worth the buy!
customer_reviews.author: Leta Marie DeMello

customer_reviews.title: Handy & Easy to put away!
customer_reviews.text: it's just as they said it would be and thankfully it wasn't hard to figure out unfortunately there was no directions, at least it was easy to figure out to unfold it after 20min.
customer_reviews.author: Benjamin

customer_reviews.title: Really cool
customer_reviews.text: Was a bit confused initially on how to work it, but once I did it looked awesome!
customer_reviews.author: R1990

customer_reviews.title: Nice gift
customer_reviews.text: Seems a little rickety but my husband really likes it.
customer_reviews.author: Lindsay

customer_reviews.title: Really nice quality
customer_reviews.text: My granddaughter is the artist in our family. She loves this stand and uses each time she paints. It has maintained quality and she feels it really good stand.
customer_reviews.author: Maryanne Schubert

customer_reviews.title: Nice Easel
customer_reviews.text: A bit hard to figure out assembly. Seems sturdy. Received quickly and packaged well.
customer_reviews.author: Bridgete

customer_reviews.title: Great Easel!
customer_reviews.text: This was a perfect choice for my wife's painting work. Setup took less than 5 minutes, it is sturdy, and it does what it says it will do. Perfect choice.
customer_reviews.author: Ron

customer_reviews.title: A little complicated
customer_reviews.text: It's overall a cool product but I probably could have bought a cheaper one that wasn't so complicated. Not super sturdy and it's complicated to assemble but once it's done it's pretty cool.
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer Beltran

customer_reviews.title: Works so good
customer_reviews.text: This is my daughters favorite to use she has several and prefers This one
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Instructions missing
customer_reviews.text: No instructions...sorry but no idea how to get the legs properly under the box...totally frustrating!
customer_reviews.author: Madeline Heitzman

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: terrible. broke first day... cant stand up properly. waste of money !
customer_reviews.author: Joanne Coghlan

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: easy install and price is so cool. and quick delivery.. thanks
customer_reviews.author: RICHARD

customer_reviews.title: Adjusts easily. Love that the canvas can go full 90 ...
customer_reviews.text: Adjusts easily. Love that the canvas can go full 90 degree. So far all screws still tighten well.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great for adults
customer_reviews.text: The size is definitely for adult which is perfect for my 5’6” daughter.
customer_reviews.author: Colorica

customer_reviews.title: ... for set up are lacking but is otherwise a good
customer_reviews.text: Directions for set up are lacking but is otherwise a good easel
customer_reviews.author: Richard Burbach

customer_reviews.title: Another great amazon deal
customer_reviews.text: This is a great deal, the easel isn't flimsy, looks great, has a leather carrying handle, even includes a shoulder strap. The only complaint is that the drawer dividers should be movable so if you want to improve your product you may want to look into that!
customer_reviews.author: Victor F

customer_reviews.title: Good easel for the price
customer_reviews.text: This is a perfectly good easel for under $100. I have used it twice now for painting and it does not budge when I am using some heavy-handed techniques. Setting up took less than ten minutes with help from one other person. It has not collapsed on me, like some other folks had trouble with. It is also aesthetically pleasing; it's just nice to look at and I enjoy displaying my paintings on it. The only irritating thing about this easel is it's legs: they can be difficult to work with when you're trying to adjust them and set up for a painting session. Regardless, I'd recommend it to anyone that's on a budget, or a beginner like me.
customer_reviews.author: Mark S Thomas

customer_reviews.title: Patience needed
customer_reviews.text: This is a professional level easel. It requires patience and time to set up - it is not for a young child. There are no assembly instructions so it's guess as you go. The quality of the item is good - the wood is nice but scratches easily. We're still deciding whether to keep it or return it for a "tween" artist.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Instructions not included
customer_reviews.text: Was so excited waiting for merchandise, very upsetting when needed to assemble, and to top it off a missing screws to hold the table. I WAS GUESSING ALL THE TIME HOW TO SET IT UP. VERY DISAPPOINTED
customer_reviews.author: Esmeralda

customer_reviews.title: It looks as beautiful as the picture.
customer_reviews.text: I put it together in less than 10 minutes, it was on time and perfect for what I need.
customer_reviews.author: David & Susan Coplan

customer_reviews.title: she loved it and it matches the wood in our home
customer_reviews.text: Xmas present for my wife, she loved it and it matches the wood in our home!
customer_reviews.author: patrick

customer_reviews.title: Great field easel
customer_reviews.text: Bought as an Xmas gift. Very well made, lots of storage, very adjustable.
customer_reviews.author: G. Watson

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: Mine didn’t come in the box didplayed, no instructions, put together loose and rattles every time you touch it.
customer_reviews.author: Paul Renault

customer_reviews.title: This was a great gift for my girlfriend's birthday
customer_reviews.text: This was a great gift for my girlfriend's birthday. It's simple to use and fairly sturdy once you tighten everything down.
customer_reviews.author: Rising Phoenix

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: My daughter LOVES this. It was a Christmas gift for her
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer Gaskins

customer_reviews.title: but it looks very cool. I do wish they had added some directions
customer_reviews.text: It's a bit delicate, but it looks very cool. I do wish they had added some directions, particularly regarding the actual easel part. I suppose they believe you'll know what each part does and how to use them correctly. Otherwise, it's very nifty!
customer_reviews.author: Geoff G.

customer_reviews.title: Two Stars
customer_reviews.text: Super bulky and heavy. It is not built for kids. The screws have a hard time staying tight.
customer_reviews.author: dara

customer_reviews.title: Every artist needs one
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely in love with this easel! It's easy to put up or put away, very strong and sturdy, and its GORGEOUS! Plenty of storage room for paints and brushes also 10/10 would reccomend
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

product_meta.title: U.S. Art Supply Coronado Walnut Easel, Large Adjustable Wooden French Style Field and Studio Sketchbox Tripod Easel with Drawer, Artist Wood Palette, Premium Beechwood, Painting, Sketching Stand
feature_bullets: A classically designed large plein air French style field and studio sketchbox easel that converts into a high tripod painting stand easel with a storage drawer. A walnut colored wood easel box that's oil finished. Made with hand sanded high quality aged Beechwood that's grown in Germany. Also includes a 18 inch wooden painters palette.

Sturdy lightweight tripod sketchbox easel that can be adjusted to any incline angle position depending on the need, and will accommodate a canvas up to 34". Easel folds down to a compact box with a leatherette carry handle and a shoulder strap. Use the easel as a canvas carrier too by attaching them on the outside of the folded easel.

Storage sketchbox is divided into a 4 compartment interior with 3 removable dividing slats for adjusting compartment sizes, plus a bonus storage area below the drawer. Store and organize sketch pads, paints, brushes, markers, pens, paper and other essential art supplies. It's deal for keeping yourself organized while painting, drawing and sketching.

Folded Dimensions: 17" wide by 22" deep by 6.5" high, easel adjusts up to 72" in total maximum height. Adjustable easel legs with sturdy rubber feet. It's a durable user friendly art, studio and sketchbox easel that's great for use by kids, beginners, students, as well as for advanced artists and professionals.

Risk Free Purchase with our 100% Lifetime Satisfaction Guarantee. U.S. Art Supply is an industry leader in Art Supplies, so purchase our products with the confidence that we'll offer you a 100% lifetime satisfaction guarantee that if you're not happy with them at anytime, we'll provide a full replacement or refund.
